verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I go to the rock of my salvation I go to the stone That the builders rejected I run to the mountain And the mountain stands by me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When all around is sinking sand On Christ the Solid Rock I stand When I need a shelter, When I need a friend I go to the Rock.{/lang-eng}
